Summary: saw bright light, size of star in sky, ascend, straight up at a very high speed until disappearing in long arch out of atmosphere
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Asheville
There were no other sightings in Asheville on or around July 28th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsA bright orange-red light was observed already in flight, heading directly up extremely fast . until disappearing out of the earth's atmosphere. The light from the object was either seemed to fade as it accelerated upward and away from the planet's surface. This was observed from the subway parking lot on new leceister hwy looking towards the southwest in direction of smokey park hwy.
